name: The Silly Game
description:
oh wow, I can't add audio. Oh well.

With the average knowledge of a complete idiot, I present to YOU...

..A Silly Game.

The Silly Game is actually short, and it's pretty weird, and lacks a lot of things, such as audio, and a long story line.

..But at least it's silly? I don't know.. Just download it, or don't.
